place.name: SARNESFIELD
place.gazetteerText: SARNESFIELD, a parish in Weobly district, Hereford; 2 miles W S W of Weobly, and 2¾ N E of Kinnersley r. station. Post-town, Weobly, Herefordshire. Acres, 1, 256. Real property, £1, 570. Pop., 120. Houses, 28. The manor belongs to J. Arkwright, Esq. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Hereford. Value, £203.* Patron, T. Monington, Esq. The church is Norman, and was recently restored. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
